description: Scorpio is the eighth astrological sign in the zodiac, originating from the constellation of Scorpius. It spans 210°-240° ecliptic longitude. Under the tropical zodiac (most commonly used in Western astrology), the Sun transits this sign on average from October 23 to November 22. Under the sidereal zodiac (most commonly used in Hindu astrology), the Sun is in Scorpio from approximately November 16 to December 15.
name: Scorpio
